home.title: Find Your Perfect Bus Route
home.subtitle: Search for buses by route, location, or bus ID. Get real-time information and track your journey with ease.

searchTips.route: Select starting point and destination to find buses along your route
searchTips.location: Choose a location to find nearby buses
searchTips.busId: Enter the specific bus ID to track a particular bus
searchTips.busName: Enter the bus name to find all buses with that name

realTime.title: Real-Time Tracking
realTime.description: Get live updates on bus locations and arrival times

accurateEta.title: Accurate ETAs
accurateEta.description: Plan your journey with precise arrival predictions

routeOptimization.title: Route Optimization
routeOptimization.description: Find the best routes for your daily commute

home.footer: Â© 2024 Bus Sewa. All rights reserved.

errors.noBusesRoute: No buses found for this route. The buses might not be currently operating on this path or try searching with nearby locations.
errors.noBusesLocation: No buses found in this area. Try searching in a different location or check back later.
errors.busNotFound: Bus with ID  not found. Please check the bus ID and try again.
errors.routeParams: Select both starting point and destination.
errors.locationParams: Select a location to search nearby buses.
errors.searchError: An error occurred while searching. Please try again.

busResults.noBusesRoute: No buses found along this route. This could mean buses aren't currently operating on this path, or try searching with locations that have more bus coverage.
busResults.noBusesBusId: No bus found with this ID. Please check the bus ID and try again.
busResults.noBusesLocation: No buses found in this area. Try expanding your search radius or searching in a different location.

searchTips.title: Search Tips:
searchTips.tip1: Try searching from bus stops or major landmarks
searchTips.tip2: Make sure your locations have good bus coverage
searchTips.tip4: Check if buses operate at the current time
